verses.name: Genesis 42:16
verses.text: Send one of you, and let him fetch your brother, and ye shall be kept in prison, that your words may be proved, whether there be any truth in you: or else by the life of Pharaoh surely ye are spies.

verses.name: Genesis 42:17
verses.text: And he put them all together into ward three days.

verses.name: Genesis 42:18
verses.text: And Joseph said unto them the third day, This do, and live; for I fear God:

verses.name: Genesis 42:19
verses.text: If ye be true men, let one of your brethren be bound in the house of your prison: go ye, carry corn for the famine of your houses:
